title: v1.6.3.9-v2 Documentation Update
details:
Updated documentation from v1.6.3.9 to v1.6.3.9-v2 with the following key features:

1. Multi-Layer Self-Write Detection - 4 layers: TransactionId → InstanceId → TabId → Timing
2. Container Isolation - originContainerId field for Firefox Containers
3. Tabs API Integration - src/background/tab-events.js with onActivated, onRemoved, onUpdated
4. Ownership History - previouslyOwnedTabIds for empty write validation
5. Promise Chain Fix - queueStorageWrite() returns false on error
6. Response Format - { success: true, data: { tabId } } standardization

New Timing Constants:
- FIREFOX_STORAGE_LISTENER_LATENCY_MAX_MS = 250
- STORAGE_LATENCY_BUFFER_MS = 50
- STORAGE_ORDERING_TOLERANCE_MS = 300
- TAB_UPDATED_DEBOUNCE_MS = 500
- DEFAULT_CONTAINER_ID = 'firefox-default'

File sizes maintained under limits:
- copilot-instructions.md: 14,960 bytes (limit 15KB)
- README.md: 9,482 bytes (limit 10KB)
